name: WildTurkeyTasting
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wild turkey tasting
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Wild Turkey Tasting brings the knowledge of Wild Turkey’s first family of bourbon, the legendary Russell clan, right to your home, guiding you through five of Wild Turkey’s boldest whiskies. It also offers a general guided tasting in case you don’t have your favorite Wild Turkey on hand. So whether you’re learning the basics, finding the perfect B(Old) Fashioned recipe, or getting some inside baseball about this iconic brand, just say “Open Wild Turkey Tasting” and be transported to Lawrenceburg, Kentucky, home of the Wild Turkey Distillery. 

Master Distillers Jimmy and Eddie Russell, along with a few family members - and a surprise appearance by Wild Turkey creative director, Matthew McConaughey, share their knowledge, history and tall tales to capture the personal and vibrant experience that is Wild Turkey.

You can also ask Wild Turkey a variety of questions to help you learn more about this exceptional spirit, including the history of the distillery, the perfect glassware, and even the difference between whiskey and bourbon.

Once you’ve confirmed your birthdate, you can ask things like:

ex) “Assistant, tell me a fun fact about whiskey.”
ex) “Assistant, how is whiskey made?”
ex) “Assistant, can I add ice or water to my whiskey?”
ex) “Assistant, what is nosing whiskey?”
ex) “Assistant, start a tasting for Wild Turkey 101.”

NOTICE: This app is for Mature audiences. Wild Turkey Tasting provides instructions for making alcoholic drinks and is intended for adults of legal drinking age. You will need to verify your age by confirming your birthdate before using this app. 

Never Compromise. Drink Responsibly. ©2020 Campari America, New York, NY
